<center><b>
*How can we make accurate information more desirable?*

*Why do we tend to prefer information that supports our existing beliefs?*

*How can we limit the spread of misinformation and disinformation online?*
</b></center>
<br>

I'm a postdoctoral researcher at Columbia University studying our relationship with information.

These are examples of the type of questions that guide my research interests. I combine experimental design from cognitive psychology with computational modelling to address these questions.
